name: Flip Palace
description:
flip in and out of the walls to solve handcrafted puzzles.

controls:
WASD / arrows to move
space can also be used to jump
esc to pause

credits:
music by Levi:

special thanks to everyone who helped playtest!
this is my first puzzle game and i definitely learnt a lot. i hope you enjoy it :)
